measured_by: model-based weight ω from hybrid reinforcement-learning model
justification: “We used an established hybrid reinforcement-learning model … to determine individual reliance on model-based decision making… The model-based weight ω … reflects the relative influence of the model-based learner.”

measured_by: difference between model-based weight in high-stakes and low-stakes trials
justification: “We defined metacontrol as the difference between the model-based weight for high-stakes trials and the model-based weight for low-stakes trials, such that a higher difference… reflects a stronger increase.”
